sentences.sContent: More serious consequence is to cause the joint layer between derma and skin to become thinner and thinner, skin can present anile evidence very quickly.
sentences.sContent_eng: More serious consequence is to cause the joint layer between derma and skin to become thinner and thinner, skin can present anile evidence very quickly.
sentences.sCn: 更严重的后果是造成真皮与表皮间的接合层变得越来越薄，肌肤就会很快呈现衰老的迹象。

sentences.sContent: But, if ground of as soon as possible undertakes the body takes exercise, plus correct dietary habit, try effectively to restrain, postpone the anile process of human body.
sentences.sContent_eng: But, if ground of as soon as possible undertakes the body takes exercise, plus correct dietary habit, try effectively to restrain, postpone the anile process of human body.
sentences.sCn: 但是，假如及早地进行身体锻炼，再加上正确的饮食习惯，完全可以有效地加以抑制，延缓人体的衰老过程。
